member.summary: Current ground level below character. Updated by CalculateGroundHeight each frame. Core vertical reference point used for ground detection, fall damage calculations, and jumping mechanics.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.halfWidth
member.summary: Half of unit's collision width in units. Default value of 6 used throughout for wall collision boundaries, ledge detection, and constraint calculations. Returned by HalfWidth property.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hangGrace
member.summary: Grace period timer that allows the player to grab onto ceilings within a short window after moving away from a climbable surface. Initialized to hangGraceTime (0.3f) when near ceilings while jumping. Counts down each frame.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hangGraceTime
member.summary: Grace period for hanging mechanics in seconds. Default value of 0.3 sets hangGrace timer when detecting hang points. Multiplied by 1.33x for upward hangs.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hasDashedInAir
member.summary: Tracks whether the player has already performed a dash while airborne in the current jump. Prevents multiple air dashes until landing, reset to false upon touching ground.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.jumpTime
member.summary: Multi-purpose timer for jump-related mechanics. Set to 0.13 seconds at the start of a standard jump and controls jump boost duration. Also prevents wall climbing immediately after jumping. Different jump types use values between 0.03-0.07 seconds.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastCollumn
member.summary: Previous grid column position. Field exists but usage not found in current implementation. Note: Field name contains spelling error ("Collumn" instead of "Column").

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastDashSpeedM
member.summary: Previous frame's dash speed multiplier value. Used for smooth interpolation of dash speeds and to detect dash state changes. Helps create fluid dash animations and movement curves.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastJumpTime
member.summary: Timestamp of most recent jump action. Used for various jump cooldowns: 0.08s minimum between jumps, 0.2s for wall jumps, and 0.3s for ceiling grab attempts.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastLandTime
member.summary: Timestamp of the most recent ground landing. Used for "coyote time" or grace jumping, allowing jumps shortly after leaving a platform. Enables more forgiving platforming by permitting jumps within a small window after walking off ledges.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastParentPosition
member.summary: Intended to store previous parent position. Field exists but is never used in current implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastParentWorldPos
member.summary: Caches parent's world position for movement calculations. Used to calculate parentedDiff in ShiftUnitWithParent based on position changes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastParentedToTransform
member.summary: Tracks previous parent transform for detecting parent changes. Used to apply momentum when switching parents or leaving a moving platform. Set to null in Initialize.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastRow
member.summary: Previous grid row position. Field exists but usage not found in current implementation. Likely intended for grid-based movement tracking.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ledgeGrapple
member.summary: Indicates if the character is currently grabbing a ledge. Works with wasLedgeGrapple for state transition detection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ledgeOffsetY
member.summary: Vertical offset applied when grabbing ledges. Used to calculate which animation frame to display during ledge grapple animations, with values typically ranging from 0 to 13.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.leftTapTime
member.summary: Timestamp of the last left direction button press. Used with minDashTapTime to detect left double-tap for dashing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.maxFallSpeed
member.summary: Terminal velocity limit for falling in units per second (default -400). Prevents acceleration beyond this speed when falling. Can be modified temporarily by abilities or environmental effects like fans or low gravity zones.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.maxWallClimbYI
member.summary: Maximum upward velocity allowed when initiating wall climbing. Default value of 100 prevents climbing at high speeds. Different units may have different values (e.g., Alien: 250).

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.minDashTapTime
member.summary: Maximum time window (0.33 seconds) between two directional taps to trigger a dash. If second tap occurs within this window, dash is initiated.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.noclipSpeed
member.summary: Movement speed when in level editor noclip mode. Default value of 200 units per second. Only active when Map.isEditing and LevelEditorGUI.NoClip are true. Speed increases while moving up to +300/sec.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.oldJumpForce
member.summary: Unused field that was likely intended to store the original jump force during temporary modifications. Initialized to -1 but never used in implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.originalMaxFallSpeed
member.summary: Stores the default terminal velocity value (default -400). Used to restore normal falling physics after temporary modifications from abilities or effects. Ensures fall speed limits return to baseline after special states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parachuteTemporyPositionY
member.summary: Smooth Y-position interpolation for parachute deployment visuals. Initialized to camera position when parachute activates and gradually moves up toward actual position at 250 units/second. Creates smooth "pulling up" effect for attached visual elements.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parentHasMovedTime
member.summary: Timer tracking when parent object has moved. Set to 0.5 seconds when parent moves and affects wall drag mechanics while positive. Decrements by delta time in RunMovement.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parentVelocityInheritM
member.summary: Multiplier for inheriting velocity from parent objects. Default value of 1.0 applies full parent velocity. Used when unimpaling and in movement calculations. Reset to 1 after impalement ends.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parentedDiff
member.summary: Movement difference calculated when parented to moving objects. Applied to unit position and transfers momentum (adds to xIBlast/yI) when leaving parent.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.rightTapTime
member.summary: Timestamp of the last right direction button press. Used with minDashTapTime to detect right double-tap for dashing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.rumbleAmountPerShot
member.summary: Controller vibration intensity per shot fired. Default value of 0.3. Intended for gamepad feedback but not actively used in base implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.screenMaxX
member.summary: Maximum X coordinate of current camera/screen boundary. Set via SetResolutionCamera.GetScreenExtents. Used for screen constraint checks and respawn positioning.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.screenMaxY
member.summary: Maximum Y coordinate of current camera/screen boundary. Set via SetResolutionCamera.GetScreenExtents. Used for top-of-screen constraints in MapExtents mode.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.screenMinX
member.summary: Minimum X coordinate of current camera/screen boundary. Set via SetResolutionCamera.GetScreenExtents. Used with screenMaxX to calculate screen center for respawning.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.screenMinY
member.summary: Minimum Y coordinate of current camera/screen boundary. Set via SetResolutionCamera.GetScreenExtents. Used to detect when character falls below screen (with 30 unit buffer).

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.specialAttackXIBoost
member.summary: Horizontal velocity boost applied during special attacks. Added to total velocity calculation to provide special move momentum.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.specialAttackYIBoost
member.summary: Vertical velocity boost applied during special attacks. Added to vertical velocity calculation to provide special move momentum.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.speed
member.summary: Base horizontal movement speed in units per second (default 110). Core value used throughout movement calculations for walking and running. Modified by various factors like terrain, status effects, and attached enemies.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.standingHeadHeight
member.summary: Default head height when standing in units. Default value of 18 sets initial headHeight and is restored when standing up from crouch.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useAttackJumpForceForAttack
member.summary: Flag indicating if special attack jump force should be used for attacks. Checked by AI systems to determine attack behavior and triggers temporary jump force modification.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallClimbing
member.summary: Current wall climbing state flag. Set true when initiating wall climb. Affects movement physics, animations, and special moves like air dash. Reset when leaving walls or transitioning states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallClimbingWallTransform
member.summary: Reference to wall being climbed. Set in AssignWallTransform when touching walls and used as part of the parenting system. Reset to null in ShiftUnitWithParent.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallClimbingWallTransformLocalPos
member.summary: Local position on wall for climbing calculations. Set using InverseTransformPoint in AssignWallTransform and returned by GetParentedToPos during wall climbing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallDrag
member.summary: Indicates if the character is sliding down a wall. When set to true, triggers wall drag audio loop and can initiate wall climbing if conditions are met. Automatically deactivates parachute when wall dragging begins.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallDragTime
member.summary: Timer controlling wall sliding effect when touching walls. Set to 0.2 seconds on wall contact and prevents downward movement while active. Creates a brief "stick" effect that slows descent along walls.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasConstrainedLeft
member.summary: Previous frame's left wall collision state. Updated from constrainedLeft each frame. Used to detect wall release for state transitions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasConstrainedRight
member.summary: Previous frame's right wall collision state. Updated from constrainedRight each frame. Used to detect wall release for state transitions like ceiling hanging.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasDashing
member.summary: Previous frame's dash state, used for state change detection. Compared with current dashing state to trigger dash start effects and sounds.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasLedgeGrapple
member.summary: Previous frame's ledge grapple state. Used for edge detection to determine when ledge grabbing begins or ends.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasWallClimbing
member.summary: Previous wall climbing state. Field exists but is never used in current implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasWallDragging
member.summary: Previous frame's wall drag state for transition detection. Updated from wallDrag each frame. Used to detect wall drag state changes and prevents immediate re-grabbing of walls after release.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.waterDampingX
member.summary: Horizontal movement damping factor when submerged in water. Default value of 0.95 multiplies xI and xIBlast velocities, creating water resistance.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.waterDampingY
member.summary: Vertical movement damping factor when submerged in water. Default value of 0.65 multiplies yIT velocity, creating stronger vertical water resistance than horizontal.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.xIAttackExtra
member.summary: Additional horizontal velocity during attack animations. Used by characters like BroLee for martial arts moves and BrocSnipes for sniper recoil. Reset to 0 after attacks complete.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.xIBlast
member.summary: Horizontal knockback velocity component from explosions and impacts. Clamped to [-200, 200] range and affected by water damping. Adds to total velocity calculation without affecting base movement.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.xIT
member.summary: Frame-interpolated horizontal movement distance. Calculated as (xI + xIBlast + xIAttackExtra + specialAttackXIBoost) * deltaTime. Modified by wall constraints and water damping. Reduced by 0.95x when carrying objects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.yIBlast
member.summary: Vertical knockback velocity component from explosions. Set via SetVelocity method and added to vertical velocity with clamping. Creates upward or downward force from impacts.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.yIT
member.summary: Frame-interpolated vertical movement distance. Calculated as (yI + specialAttackYIBoost) * deltaTime each frame. Modified by water damping, constraints, and traps. Represents actual vertical position change per frame.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualDuckingRunning
member.summary: Specialized ducking run animation that uses an 8-frame cycle with foot effects every 4 frames. Adjusts gun position to (2f, -1f) to accommodate ducking pose and includes submersion checks for particle effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualIdleDuckingFrames
member.summary: Provides the base ducking idle animation with adjusted gun positioning. Similar to standing idle but uses a different frame and positions gun at offset (2f, -1f) to accommodate the ducking pose.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualIdleFrames
member.summary: Provides the base standing idle animation when the character is not performing any special actions. Activates gun, sets frame rate to 0.0667f, and displays a static pose. Conditionally sets gun sprite based on firing state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualJumpingDuckingFrames
member.summary: Handles specific jumping animation frames when character is in ducking state during jump.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualJumpingFrames
member.summary: Manages complex jumping animation frames based on vertical and horizontal velocity. Supports three distinct velocity states: fast rising (yI > 20f), fast falling (yI < -55f), and normal jumping. Includes gun positioning and frame validation with different animations for varying movement speeds.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateActualNewRunningFrames
member.summary: Running animation with environmental responsiveness. Adjusts frame rate based on quicksand (3x slower) and barbed wire (2x slower) conditions. Generates foot particle effects every 4 frames when not submerged and plays footstep sounds. Supports dash animation states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateAirdash
member.summary: Handles horizontal air dash animation with direction-based sprite selection and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateAirdashDown
member.summary: Handles downward air dash animation with specific sprite frames and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateChimneyFlip
member.summary: Handles chimney flip animation sequence for wall-to-wall traversal between narrow spaces.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHanging
member.summary: Handles hanging animation from ledges or ceilings with proper sprite positioning and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHighFiveHold
member.summary: Handles animation for holding high-five gesture with proper timing and visual feedback.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateHighFiveRelease
member.summary: Handles animation for releasing/completing high-five gesture with celebration effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateIdle
member.summary: Main idle animation dispatcher that routes to specific animations based on character state. Implements a priority hierarchy system that handles ducking versus standing states separately. Routes to appropriate sub-animations including melee, high-five, special abilities, rolling, gestures, and dancing based on current character flags.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateImpaled
member.summary: Handles impalement animation with different frames for living versus dead characters. Living characters use a clamped frame range, while dead characters or aliens use a specific static frame. Deactivates gun and resets sprite offset during impalement.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateImpaledByChainSaw
member.summary: Sets a specific animation frame for chainsaw impalement death. Deactivates the gun and resets sprite offset. Simpler than regular impalement animation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateJumping
member.summary: Handles jumping animation sequences including takeoff, flight, and landing preparation phases.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateLedgeGrapple
member.summary: Handles ledge grappling animation with grabbing and climbing motion sequences.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateMelee
member.summary: Virtual method for melee attack animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateOnBackOffUnit
member.summary: Sets the sprite frame for when the character is backing away from another unit.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimatePockettedSpecial
member.summary: Executes pocketed special ability animation sequence. Manages 10-frame animation cycle, triggers ability execution at frame 4, and handles gun deactivation/reactivation throughout the sequence.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimatePushing
member.summary: Animates character pushing objects with specialized timing and gun orientation. Uses 3x slower frame rate than normal running, flips gun sprite horizontally (scale -1f on X-axis), and uses a specific sprite sheet row. Plays footstep sounds every 4 frames.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateRolling
member.summary: Animates the rolling sequence using a countdown-based frame system. Sets frame rate to 0.025f, deactivates the gun during rolling, and plays landing sound at frame 7 of the sequence.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateRunning
member.summary: Main running animation dispatcher with comprehensive state priority system. Handles throwable objects, melee, special abilities, pushing, and rolling states. For base running, generates environmental effects including foot particles and sounds. Adapts frame rate for quicksand environments.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial
member.summary: Handles special ability animation sequences. Manages timing, facing direction, and animation state for special moves.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial2
member.summary: Virtual method for secondary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial3
member.summary: Virtual method for tertiary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateSpecial4
member.summary: Virtual method for quaternary special ability animation. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateStrungUpFrames
member.summary: Sets the sprite animation frame for when the character is strung up or hanged. Displays a static death pose frame.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateThrowingHeldObject
member.summary: Handles animation for throwing held objects like grenades or mooks. Sets throwing state and manages object release timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateZipline
member.summary: Handles zipline traversal animation with movement-based sprite selection and timing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateFaderTrailInstance
member.summary: Creates a fading trail effect sprite at character's current position and rotation. Instantiates fader sprite prefab, matches character's scale and material properties, and configures sprite dimensions for trail visualization.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunGun
member.summary: Updates gun animation by managing frame timing. Increments gun counter and decreases gun frame when not wall dragging, calling SetGunSprite to update visuals when frame changes occur.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetGunSprite(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the gun sprite frame and row based on current character state. Uses special hanging frame offset when hanging, climbing one-armed, or on zipline.
member.param: The frame index for the gun sprite
The row index for the gun sprite sheet

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetSpriteOffset(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets sprite rendering offset for visual positioning adjustments during animations.
member.param: X coordinate offset for sprite positioning
Y coordinate offset for sprite positioning

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.Renderer
member.summary: Gets the MeshRenderer component attached to this GameObject. Uses lazy initialization to cache the component reference for performance.
member.value: The MeshRenderer component, cached after first access.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.material
member.summary: Gets or sets the shared material of the MeshRenderer. This property provides direct access to modify the character's visual appearance.
member.value: The shared Material used by the MeshRenderer component.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._frozenGunMaterial
member.summary: Cached material for frozen gun appearance. Currently not actively used in TestVanDammeAnim - the Freeze method creates materials directly. May be used by derived classes or reserved for optimization to avoid material creation during gameplay.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._frozenMaterial
member.summary: Cached material for frozen appearance. Currently not actively used in TestVanDammeAnim - the Freeze method creates materials directly. May be used by derived classes or reserved for optimization to avoid material creation during gameplay.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._oilyGunMaterial
member.summary: Cached material for oil-covered gun appearance. Applied alongside _oilyMaterial to ensure both character and weapon show oil coverage. Uses the same oil shader as character material for consistent visual effect.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim._oilyMaterial
member.summary: Cached material for oil-covered appearance. Applied when the character is covered in oil, giving a dark, slick visual effect. Created on-demand using special oil shader with darkened color values for visual feedback of flammable state.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.blood
member.summary: Array of blood shrapnel prefabs intended for visual effects. Currently unused in favor of EffectsController.CreateBloodParticles() which uses the bloodColor field instead. Likely reserved for custom blood particle effects in derived classes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.currentGesture
member.summary: Tracks the current gesture animation being performed (salute, wave, flex, etc.). Set via SetGestureAnimation RPC method and used by AnimateGesture to display the appropriate animation frames. Gestures block movement when active and are primarily used for multiplayer emotes and character interactions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.defaultMaterial
member.summary: Stores the original material of the character sprite. Used as a reference to restore normal appearance after visual effects like freezing or oil coverage. Cached during initialization to ensure proper material restoration.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.frameRate
member.summary: Animation frame playback rate in seconds per frame (default 0.0667, approximately 15 FPS). Controls the speed of sprite animations. Lower values create faster animations, higher values create slower animations.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gunCounter
member.summary: Animation timer for gun sprite updates. Increments by delta time and triggers frame updates every 0.0334 seconds, providing smooth gun animation at approximately 30 FPS.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gunFrame
member.summary: Tracks the current animation frame for weapon-related animations. Acts as a cooldown timer that prevents certain actions when greater than 0. Decremented during gun animation updates and initialized to 3 at start.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gunMaterial
member.summary: Stores the original material of the gun sprite. Used to restore normal gun appearance after visual effects. Cached separately from character material since gun may have different shader properties or textures.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gunSprite
member.summary: Sprite renderer component for the character's weapon. Updated independently from character sprite to show weapon animations and states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gunSpriteHangingFrame
member.summary: Starting frame offset for gun animations when character is hanging or climbing. Default value of 6. Added to the base frame number to show different gun positions for hanging states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gunSpritePixelHeight
member.summary: Height of each gun sprite frame in pixels. Default value of 32 pixels. Calculated from gunSprite.pixelDimensions.y and used for sprite sheet row calculations.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.gunSpritePixelWidth
member.summary: Width of each gun sprite frame in pixels. Default value of 32 pixels. Used to calculate sprite sheet coordinates and passed to shaders for visual effects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.hangingOneArmed
member.summary: Indicates whether the character is currently hanging from a ledge with one arm. Used by the animation system to display one-armed hanging sprites (row 11, frame 0) versus two-armed hanging. Set during ledge grapple mechanics.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.heroTrail
member.summary: Active trail renderer that creates speed lines behind the hero during fast movement. Enabled when horizontal speed exceeds threshold and trail time dynamically adjusts between 0.1-0.4 seconds based on movement speed. Disabled when speed drops or hero dies.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.heroTrailPrefab
member.summary: Prefab reference for creating hero trail visual effects. Likely assigned in Unity editor and used as template for instantiating the heroTrail object. Part of the movement trail rendering system.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.instantiatedSkeleton
member.summary: Holds the skeleton or corpse object created when the character dies. Used for managing death gibs and can be exploded when hit while melting.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.knifeHand
member.summary: Alternates which hand is used for knife climbing animations. Incremented during climbing actions and used with modulo 2 to control left/right hand animations for wall climbing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastT
member.summary: Time elapsed during the previous frame in seconds (default 0.1). Used for frame-independent animation timing and physics calculations. Helps smooth animations during variable frame rates.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.meltingSprite
member.summary: Manages the visual effect when the character melts from acid damage. Set when the melting animation begins and checked to determine when the melting animation completes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.meshRenderer
member.summary: Reference to the MeshRenderer component for 3D rendering. Rarely used directly in TestVanDammeAnim as characters primarily use sprite-based rendering. May be utilized by specific derived classes for special visual effects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.runningFrameRate
member.summary: Base animation frame timing for running animations in seconds. Default value of 0.025 seconds. Multiplied by 3 for slower animations in quicksand or other special states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.sprite
member.summary: Main SpriteSM component responsible for rendering the character sprite. Initialized from GetComponent in Awake and used extensively throughout animation methods to control sprite sheet navigation via SetLowerLeftPixel, texture updates, and visual effects like color changes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.spriteOffset
member.summary: Stores the original sprite offset position from initialization. Used as the base reference point when applying temporary sprite position adjustments via SetSpriteOffset, allowing the sprite to return to its original position after effects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.spritePixelHeight
member.summary: Height of each sprite frame in pixels on the sprite sheet. Initialized from sprite.pixelDimensions.y in Awake and used in SetLowerLeftPixel calculations to navigate sprite sheet rows during animation. Default value is 32 pixels.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.spritePixelWidth
member.summary: Width of each sprite frame in pixels on the sprite sheet. Initialized from sprite.pixelDimensions.x in Awake and used in SetLowerLeftPixel calculations to navigate sprite sheet columns during animation. Default value is 32 pixels.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useDashFrames
member.summary: Controls whether to use dash-specific animation frames. When true, uses row 8 frames 0-3 for horizontal dashing and row 9 frames 5-7 for vertical air dashing. Enables visual feedback for dash abilities when available.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useDuckingFrames
member.summary: Controls whether to display ducking/crouching animation frames. When true (default), shows proper ducking sprites when character crouches. When false, character maintains standing sprite even while ducked, which can look incorrect but may be used for specific characters.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useLadderClimbingTransition
member.summary: Enables smooth transition animations when mounting or dismounting ladders. When true, plays a transition animation for ladderClimbingTransitionFrames duration before normal climbing begins. Works with useNewLadderClimbingFrames for complete ladder animation control.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewDuckingFrames
member.summary: Configuration toggle intended for switching between old and new ducking animation sets. Currently not actively used in the code but reserved for future animation system updates.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewFrames
member.summary: Configuration toggle intended for using updated animation frames. Currently not actively used in the code but reserved for future general animation system updates.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewHighFivingFrames
member.summary: Controls whether to use updated animation frames for high-five interactions. When true, uses frames 4-5 from row 1 of the sprite sheet for the high-five gesture. Set per-character to enable or disable the high-five animation system.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewKnifeClimbingFrames
member.summary: Controls whether to use updated animation frames for knife wall climbing. When true, uses frames from row 5 of the sprite sheet instead of generic climbing frames. Set per-character in Unity Inspector to customize wall climbing animations.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewKnifingFrames
member.summary: Toggle that switches between old and new melee/knifing animation sets. When enabled, uses different animation frames and movement patterns in AnimateMelee and RunMeleeMovement, affecting both the visual presentation and physics of melee attacks.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewLadderClimbingFrames
member.summary: Controls whether to use updated animation frames for ladder climbing. When true, uses frames from row 4 of the sprite sheet instead of generic climbing frames. Set per-character to customize ladder climbing animations.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewLedgeGrappleFrames
member.summary: Controls whether to use updated animation frames for ledge grappling. When true, uses frames from row 11 of the sprite sheet for the ledge hanging animation. Set per-character to enable new ledge grapple visuals.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewPushingFrames
member.summary: Toggles between old and new pushing animation frames. When true, uses updated sprite frames for the block pushing animation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.useNewThrowingFrames
member.summary: Toggle that switches between old and new throwing animation sets. When false, uses frames 17-22 on row 1; when true, uses frames 17-24 on row 5. Affects both the throwing animation sequence and held object positioning during throws.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasHangingMoving
member.summary: Tracks state change for hanging movement animations. Set to true when starting hanging movement and used to detect transition from moving to stationary while hanging.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.yScale
member.summary: Maintains the vertical scale of the sprite (default 1.0). Preserved during direction changes to ensure consistent sprite appearance. Some derived classes may modify this for special visual effects like squashing or stretching animations.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AlertNearbyMooks
member.summary: Alerts nearby enemy units to player presence within 8x8 unit area. Updates last alert time for tracking alert frequency.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnimateFrozen
member.summary: Sets the visual appearance when the character is frozen. Deactivates the gun sprite and sets the character sprite to frame 11 (frozen pose) on the sprite sheet. This method is called by Freeze to establish the frozen visual state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Blind(System.Single)
member.summary: Stuns the character for a specified duration, applying a blindness effect that prevents all actions. In DeathMatch mode, heroes receive a 70% reduction in stun duration. Also calculates a vocal delay (0.2-0.7 seconds) for playing stun sound effects.
member.param: Duration in seconds to remain stunned

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Blind
member.summary: Applies a default 3-second blind/stun effect to the character. Immediately stops all movement and sets the stun timer, with the same vocal delay calculation as the timed version for sound effects.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Boost(System.Single)
member.summary: Applies temporary speed boost effect for specified duration.
member.param: Duration of boost effect in seconds

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.BrosMustFailToWin
member.summary: Marks a player unit as needing to fail for victory conditions. Only applies to player-controlled units and disables gibbing to ensure proper failure tracking.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CalculateZombieInput
member.summary: Processes input for zombie units by copying control inputs from their revive source. Decrements zombie delay timer and explicitly disables special abilities for zombies.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanBeThrown
member.summary: Determines if the character can be thrown by other units. Characters that are heavy or currently impaled cannot be thrown.
member.returns: True if the character can be thrown, false if heavy or impaled

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanFreeze
member.summary: Checks if the hero can be affected by freeze effects. Base implementation always returns true, can be overridden for freeze-immune heroes.
member.returns: True if the hero can be frozen

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckDestroyed
member.summary: Handles character destruction cleanup. Removes from map tracking, reduces lives if applicable, and triggers unit destruction.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckFacingDirection
member.summary: Manages character facing direction based on movement, input, and special abilities. Prevents direction changes during chimney flips, air dashes, or when configured to maintain special facing direction.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckNotifyDeathType
member.summary: Checks if enough time has passed since death to notify death type. Calls NotifyDeathType after 0.33 second delay.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CopyInput(TestVanDammeAnim,System.Single@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Copies control inputs from one unit to another, primarily used for zombie control. If the source is alive, copies all input states. If dead, sets all inputs to false.

Delay timer reference (not modified by this method)
Up input state to set
Down input state to set
Left input state to set
Right input state to set

Special input state to set
High-five input state to set

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateElectricShockPuff(System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a visual electric shock effect at the hero's position. Adds random positioning offsets for variation and randomly flips the effect horizontally. Parents the effect to the hero's transform so it follows movement.
member.param: Vertical offset from the hero's position for the effect

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CreateSkeleton
member.summary: Creates appropriate skeleton prefab based on character type (BigGuy, HellLostSoul, Grenadier, etc.) for death/melting animations. Only creates if skeleton doesn't already exist.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Dance(System.Single)
member.summary: Makes the character dance for the specified duration. Sets dance timer and applies a stun effect for the same duration to prevent movement during the dance.
member.param: Duration of the dance in seconds

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DelayedRevive(System.Single)
member.summary: Handles delayed revival mechanics for the hero. Virtual method intended for override by specific revival implementations.
member.param: Time in seconds before revival occurs

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.DestroyUnit
member.summary: Virtual method that destroys the game object. Can be overridden by derived classes for custom destruction behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Disable
member.summary: Disables the component to prevent updates and behavior. Sets the enabled state to false.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.FireFlashAvatar
member.summary: Triggers the avatar firing flash effect with a short animation timer (0.04 seconds). Sets the avatar to fire state and applies controller rumble feedback for firing actions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Freeze(System.Single)
member.summary: Freezes the character with a frozen visual effect for a specified duration. Creates frozen materials using a special "Frozen" shader with blue tint (0.094f, 0.388f, 0.718f) and applies them to both character and gun sprites. The character is immobilized and plays a freeze scream sound effect while in this state.
member.param: Duration in seconds to remain frozen

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.HideAndDisableCharacter
member.summary: Completely hides and disables the character from gameplay. Disables rendering, main script, AI, and collision while setting invulnerability. Used for cutscenes or special game states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Impale(UnityEngine.Transform,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Impales the character on a transform, drastically reducing movement capability while maintaining position constraints.
member.param: The transform to impale the character on.
The direction of the impaling force.
The amount of damage to apply.
The horizontal velocity component.
The vertical velocity component.
Horizontal offset from the impale transform.
Vertical offset from the impale transform.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsExitingDoor
member.summary: Checks if the character is currently exiting a door. Base implementation always returns false, intended for override by derived classes.
member.returns: True if exiting a door, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsFlexing
member.summary: Checks if the hero is performing a flex gesture. Requires the unit to be a hero and currently in the Flex gesture state.
member.returns: True if the hero is flexing

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsHanging
member.summary: Checks if the unit is currently in a hanging state. Returns true when actionState equals Hanging.
member.returns: True if the unit is hanging

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsInQuicksand
member.summary: Checks if the hero is currently sinking in quicksand. Returns the current quicksand state tracked by the movement system.
member.returns: True if the hero is in quicksand

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsIncapacitated
member.summary: Checks if the hero is currently stunned or frozen. Returns true if either stun time or frozen time is active.
member.returns: True if the hero cannot act due to stun or freeze

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Melt
member.summary: Initiates melting animation sequence using character-specific melting prefabs. Sets melted state and creates appropriate melting effects for different enemy types and states.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.MustBroFailToWin
member.summary: Checks whether this unit must fail for the victory condition to be met. Used in special game modes where player failure is the objective.
member.returns: True if this unit must fail for victory

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RecallBro
member.summary: Handles character recall/respawn with visual fade effect. Switches to transparent shader, changes layer to Effects, removes from map tracking, and assigns to spectator player. Network RPC method that can be called remotely.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReceiveHeroKillReport(KillData)
member.summary: Receives notification when this hero kills another unit. Virtual method intended for override by specific hero implementations.
member.param: Data about the kill including victim and damage type

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReduceLives(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decrements player lives when the character dies. Only processes for the owning player, prevents double processing, and notifies HeroController of the death.
member.param: Whether the character was completely destroyed

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Reenable
member.summary: Re-enables the component after it has been disabled. Sets the enabled state to true.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReplaceWithSkinnedInstance(Unit,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Replaces this unit instance with a skinned version, transferring all state and properties to the new instance.
member.param: The skinned unit instance to replace this one with.
The X position for the replacement unit.
The Y position for the replacement unit.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RestartBubble
member.summary: Restarts the player protection bubble display with default settings. Uses player options to determine if bubbles should always be shown and considers forced bros count for bubble visibility.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RestartBubble(System.Single)
member.summary: Restarts the player protection bubble with a specified duration timer. Only functions in campaign mode and checks HUD visibility and chat state before displaying the bubble for the specific player number.
member.param: Duration in seconds to display the protection bubble

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Revive(System.Int32,System.Boolean,TestVanDammeAnim)
member.summary: Revives a dead unit, either as a zombie or restoring a player character. Clears impalement state, creates revival effects, and assigns appropriate control. For players, reassigns character and adds life. For zombies, sets ownership to revive source.
member.param: Player number to assign if reviving as player (-1 for zombie)
Whether the revived unit will be player-controlled
The unit that is reviving this character (for zombie control)
member.returns: True if revival was successful

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RollOnto(System.Int32)
member.summary: Applies knockback when another unit rolls onto this character. Uses the Knock method with horizontal force based on direction and fixed upward force.
member.param: Direction of the rolling impact (-1 left, 1 right)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunAvatarFiring
member.summary: Updates the avatar's firing animation state based on current fire input. Manages the avatar gun fire timer and switches between angry and calm states depending on whether the character is actively firing.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunAvatarRunning
member.summary: Updates the avatar's running animation by creating a bouncing effect. The avatar moves up and down based on the current run animation frame, but only when the character is in the running state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunImpaledBlood
member.summary: Creates periodic blood particle effects when the character is impaled. Manages blood spurts with randomized timing, limits effects to 5 spurts maximum, and uses artery effects for dramatic visual impact.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunTrail
member.summary: Manages the visual trail effect based on character movement speed. Enables trail when moving faster than 50% speed, with trail duration scaling from 0.1 to 0.4 seconds. Disables trail when dead or moving slowly.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetGibThreshold(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the negative health threshold at which the hero will gib instead of normal death. Lower values require more extreme damage to trigger gibbing.
member.param: The new gib threshold (typically negative)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetImmuneToOutOfBounds
member.summary: Makes the unit immune to death from going out of bounds. Used for special scenarios where units need to exist outside normal play area.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetInvulnerable(System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Makes the character invulnerable to damage for the specified duration. Can optionally display a protection bubble and/or halo effect to indicate the invulnerable state.
member.param: Duration of invulnerability in seconds
Whether to show the protection bubble (default true)
Whether to show a halo effect (default false)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetSpawnState(System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the initial spawn conditions for the hero including velocity and status effects. Network RPC method that can be called remotely to ensure consistent spawn state.
member.param: Initial horizontal velocity
Initial vertical velocity
Whether to start in tumbling state
Whether to apply parachute deployment delay
Whether to spawn with parachute active
Whether to spawn on fire

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SetWillComebackToLife(System.Single)
member.summary: Marks the character to respawn after death with the specified comeback timer. Shows a halo effect if not already displayed to indicate the respawn state.
member.param: Time in seconds before the character respawns

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ShowAndEnableCharacter
member.summary: Network wrapper for showing a hidden character. Checks ownership before sending RPC to show the character on all clients.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ShowCharacterInternal
member.summary: Re-enables and shows a previously hidden character. Restores rendering, main script functionality, and grants 1 second of invulnerability. Network RPC method that can be called remotely.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SkinUnit
member.summary: Converts this unit to a skinned variant if the player has an active skin and network ownership.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SprayBlood(System.Single,BloodColor)
member.summary: Creates blood splatter effects on nearby surfaces using raycasts. Performs a raycast in a random direction from above the character and applies blood to hit blocks. Also triggers area blood effects through Map.BloodyDoodads.
member.param: Maximum distance for blood spray raycasts
Color of the blood to spray

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Stop
member.summary: Immediately halts all character movement and actions. Clears all input flags, sets velocity to zero, resets melee states, and sets to idle if not dead.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopBeingStunned
member.summary: Virtual method for ending stun effects. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopBubble
member.summary: Stops the player protection bubble display for the specific player number (0-3). Used when invulnerability expires or when the bubble should be hidden.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Stun
member.summary: Applies a stun effect with default duration of 0.33 seconds. Calls the overloaded Stun method with the default time value.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Stun(System.Single)
member.summary: Applies a stun effect for the specified duration. Stops character movement, sets stun timer, resets blind counter if negative, and calculates vocal delay for stun sound effects based on duration.
member.param: Duration of the stun effect in seconds

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.SuckIntoPortal
member.summary: Handles the character being sucked into an exit portal with visual effects. Adds SpinAndScaleDown component for the portal animation, stops protection bubbles and syncing, and links the character to the exit portal instance. RPC-enabled for network synchronization.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TempInvulnerability(System.Single)
member.summary: Grants temporary invulnerability to TestVanDammeAnim for a specified duration. Sets invulnerable state and resets fired-while-invulnerable tracking.
member.param: Duration of invulnerability in seconds. If 0 or negative, uses default duration of 1.2 times the current frame delta time (very brief)

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.TimeBroBoost(System.Single)
member.summary: Applies time-based character boost effect for specified duration.
member.param: Duration of time boost effect in seconds

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.UnFreeze
member.summary: Removes the frozen state and restores the character's normal appearance. Resets the frozen timer to 0 and restores the default materials for both the character renderer and gun sprite (if present). This allows the character to resume normal movement and actions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Unimpale(System.Int32,DamageType,System.Single,System.Single,UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour)
member.summary: Removes the character from an impaled state, applying damage and velocity while clearing impalement constraints.
member.param: The amount of damage to apply when unimpaling.
The type of damage being applied.
The horizontal velocity to apply after unimpaling.
The vertical velocity to apply after unimpaling.
The source that caused the unimpaling.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Unrevive
member.summary: Forces the character to die after being revived. Deals crush damage equal to health+1 with knockback based on facing direction.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Unrevive
member.summary: Forces the character to die after being revived. Deals crush damage equal to health+1 with knockback based on facing direction.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.WhereDidIDie
member.summary: Returns the position where the hero died for respawn or tracking purposes. Returns the recorded death position if killed by another hero, otherwise returns current position.
member.returns: The world position where death occurred

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.YouKilledMe(Unit)
member.summary: Called when this hero kills another unit. Virtual method intended for override to handle kill-specific behavior.
member.param: The unit that was killed

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsDucking
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the character is currently in a ducking or crouching state.
member.value: true if the character is ducking; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsFrozen
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the character is currently frozen by freeze effects.
member.value: true if the character has remaining freeze time; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsParachuteActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parachute is currently active. Setting this property manages parachute GameObject visibility, physics effects, and landing invulnerability.
member.value: true if the parachute is deployed and active; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.IsPerformanceEnhanced
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether performance enhancement effects are currently active. This base implementation always returns false.
member.value: Always false for TestVanDammeAnim. Derived classes can override to implement performance boost mechanics.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.WillReviveAlready
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this unit will be automatically revived. This base implementation always returns false.
member.value: Always false for TestVanDammeAnim. Derived classes can override to implement revival mechanics.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.counter
member.summary: Gets or sets the animation frame timing counter. This counter accumulates delta time and triggers the next animation frame when it exceeds the frameRate threshold (0.0334 seconds).
member.value: The accumulated time in seconds since the last animation frame change. Resets after triggering the next frame.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledByTransform
member.summary: Gets or sets the Transform that is currently impaling this unit. Setting this property also updates the related Impaler component reference.
member.value: The Transform of the object impaling this unit, or null if not impaled.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.invulnerableTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the remaining invulnerability duration in seconds. When greater than zero, the character cannot take damage.
member.value: The duration in seconds the character remains invulnerable to damage.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.HidingPlayer
member.summary: Tracks whether the player character is currently hidden/disabled. Set to true in HideAndDisableCharacter for cutscenes and transitions. Character becomes invulnerable while hidden and sprites/renderers are disabled accordingly.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ImpaledByTransform
member.summary: Private backing field for the impaledByTransform property. Stores the Transform of the object that is currently impaling this character.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.avatarAngryTime
member.summary: Unused in base class. Reserved for BroLee implementation to control avatar/clone anger state in derived classes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.avatarGunFireTime
member.summary: Unused in base class. Reserved for BroLee implementation to control avatar/clone firing timing in derived classes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.blindCounter
member.summary: Counter for blind effect intervals. Incremented while blinded and triggers visual effects every 0.1 seconds. Reset when entering stun state. Creates periodic screen flash effects to indicate blindness status.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.bloodCountAmount
member.summary: Number of blood particles to spawn on death. Default value of 80. Used in particle creation (divided by 4) and SprayBlood calls to control visual gore intensity.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.bloodTime
member.summary: Current blood effect timer. Decremented by 0.0667 per update. When positive, creates blood particles using character's bloodColor property.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.bloodTimeOut
member.summary: Total duration limit for blood effects. Not directly used in visible base implementation but likely controls maximum blood effect duration.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canBeCoveredInAcid
member.summary: Determines if this unit can be affected by acid coverage effects (default true). When false, prevents acid visual effects and damage over time. Checked before applying acid materials and status effects. Some boss units may disable this.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canBeStrungUp
member.summary: Determines if this unit can be hung or strung up by certain traps or abilities. Currently not actively used in the codebase. May have been intended for trap mechanics or special death states where units could be suspended.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canDuck
member.summary: Determines if the character is allowed to duck. Default is true. Checked in StartDucking method and movement collision logic to enable/disable ducking ability.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canUnFreeze
member.summary: Determines if the frozen status can expire naturally over time. When true, frozenTime decrements each frame allowing automatic thawing. When false, unit remains frozen indefinitely until explicitly unfrozen by external effects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.controllingProjectile
member.summary: Unused in base class. Used by specific characters (BroDredd, BronnarJensen, BroGummer) to indicate when character is remotely controlling a projectile.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.controllingProjectileDelay
member.summary: Unused in base class. Intended for timing mechanics to prevent immediate re-control after releasing a projectile.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.dancingFrames
member.summary: Number of animation frames in the dancing sequence. Default value of 12 frames creates the complete dance animation cycle. Used with frame modulo calculation for smooth looping dance animation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.dancingFramesSheetPosition
member.summary: Starting position on the sprite sheet for dancing animation frames. Default Vector2Int(15, 14) points to row 15, column 14. The X coordinate is combined with current frame modulo for animation progression.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.dancingTime
member.summary: Duration in seconds remaining for dance effect. Decremented each frame alongside stunTime. Character dances only when both stunTime and dancingTime are greater than zero. Set by Dance() method for forced dancing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.deadHeadHeight
member.summary: Character's head height when dead in units. Default value of 10. Set in ConstrainToCeiling when actionState is Dead. Ensures dead bodies have appropriate collision boundaries.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.deadWaistHeight
member.summary: Character's waist height when dead in units. Default value of 5. Lower than standing/ducking heights to reflect prone dead position.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.deathSoundVolume
member.summary: Volume multiplier for death sound effects. Default value of 0.7. Applied at various levels (50% or 100%) to control death sound loudness.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.doRollOnLand
member.summary: Enables rolling animation when landing from significant falls. When true, character performs a roll if landing with high downward velocity (yI < -300). The roll lasts 0.133 seconds and prevents other actions during that time. Provides smooth landing from high falls.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ducking
member.summary: Tracks if the character is in a ducking/crouching state. Affects hitbox dimensions, prevents wall climbing, modifies movement speed, and changes animation frames when useDuckingFrames is true.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.duckingHeadHeight
member.summary: Character's head height when ducking in units. Default value of 13. Set in StartDucking method and used to adjust collision detection height when crouched.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.duckingToeHeight
member.summary: Character's toe height when ducking in units. Default value of 5. Slightly higher than standing (5 vs 4), possibly representing lifted feet when crouching.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.duckingWaistHeight
member.summary: Character's waist height when ducking in units. Default value of 6. Set in StartDucking method to reflect crouched position.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.firstFrame
member.summary: Generic first-frame flag common across many game objects. Initialized to true but not specifically used in TestVanDammeAnim implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.frozenTime
member.summary: Duration in seconds remaining for the freeze effect. When greater than zero, character is frozen solid with blue tint shader. Prevents all movement, modifies damage behavior, and affects death mechanics. Decremented only when canUnFreeze is true.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.halo
member.summary: Reference to a BroHalo visual effect component. Displays an angel halo above the character during certain states, particularly when marked for resurrection (willComeBackToLife). Provides visual feedback for special character states.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.idleTime
member.summary: Tracks seconds of player inactivity. Incremented when no input is received, reset on any input. Triggers AFK bubble display after threshold and enables other players to kick idle players after extended inactivity.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.immuneToOutOfBounds
member.summary: When true, prevents death from falling out of map bounds. Checked before applying out of bounds damage. Allows certain heroes or special states to survive falling off the map edges.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaleXOffset
member.summary: Horizontal offset when character is impaled. Field exists but usage not found in current implementation. Likely provides visual offset for impaled state.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaleYOffset
member.summary: Vertical offset for positioning when impaled by an object. Used in GetParentedToPos to calculate the Y position relative to the impaling transform.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledBy
member.summary: Reference to the Impaler component that has impaled this character. Used to evaluate if impalement should continue and for damage calculations. Cleared when impalement ends.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledCounter
member.summary: Timer or counter for impalement state. Field exists but usage not found in current implementation. Related to impalement mechanics.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledDamage
member.summary: Stores damage value to apply when unit is unimpaled. Set during Impale method and applied as damage in Unimpale when unit is released from impalement.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledDirection
member.summary: Direction of impalement (-1 or 1) based on impact velocity. Determines position constraints and sets minor velocity (xI = -0.01f * impaledDirection) during impalement.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledLocalPos
member.summary: Local position relative to impaling object. Field exists but is never used in current implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.impaledPosition
member.summary: World position where unit was impaled. Constrains movement to 3 units from this point while impaled to prevent excessive movement.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.isParachuteActive
member.summary: Tracks whether the parachute is currently deployed and affecting physics. When true, applies air resistance and modified gravity. Set when parachute deploys during falls, cleared on landing or parachute destruction.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.isSkinnedMook
member.summary: Flag indicating if this unit is a skinned mook enemy type. Public field but no usage found in TestVanDammeAnim base class.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastDamageType
member.summary: Stores the type of damage last received by the character. Default is DamageType.None. Used for damage-specific death effects and responses, particularly explosion damage checks.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastHitSoundTime
member.summary: Timestamp of when hurt sound was last played. Prevents sound spam with 0.1 second cooldown between hurt sounds. Updated when hurt sound plays.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.meltDuration
member.summary: Controls how long the acid melting death effect lasts in seconds. Default value of 0.7 seconds is randomized by 0.3 seconds in Awake for visual variety.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parachute
member.summary: Reference to the Parachute component attached to this unit. Created when falling from sufficient height, destroyed on landing or damage. Provides visual parachute model and modifies falling physics when active.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.parachuteDelay
member.summary: Countdown timer preventing immediate parachute deployment after certain actions. Decremented each frame when greater than zero. Ensures parachute doesn't deploy during attacks or immediately after jumping, requiring actual falling before activation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.pitchShiftAmount
member.summary: Pitch modifier added to all character sound effects. Allows voice pitch variation between different characters. Applied to special, throw, hurt, and death sounds.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.pushingTime
member.summary: Timer for push animation duration. Set to 0.06 seconds when block pushing begins and decrements each frame. Controls when to display pushing animation frames.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.recallCounter
member.summary: Timer for the recall fade-out effect, ranging from 0 to 1. Controls sprite transparency (1 - recallCounter) during despawn. Character is destroyed when counter exceeds 1.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.recalling
member.summary: Indicates if the character is being recalled/despawned with a fade-out effect. When true, character fades out over 1 second before being destroyed.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.reducedLife
member.summary: Tracks if player has lost a life but hasn't respawned yet. Set true when player dies and reset on revival. Prevents multiple life deductions for a single death.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.rollingFrames
member.summary: Current frame of the rolling animation sequence. Incremented based on time progression during rolls. Used to display the appropriate sprite frame from the rolling animation set on the sprite sheet.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.rollingTime
member.summary: Duration remaining for the rolling animation after landing from a high fall. Set to 0.133 seconds when landing with high velocity (yI < -300) if doRollOnLand is true. Prevents other actions during the roll animation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.showGestureTimer
member.summary: Timer controlling gesture animation display duration. Incremented while gesture is active and reset when gesture ends. Manages the timing of victory poses and other character gestures.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.spurtCount
member.summary: Tracks number of blood spurts created for artery effects. Limited to 5 spurts maximum. Used with impaledCounter for timing blood effect intervals.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.standingToeHeight
member.summary: Character's toe height when standing in units. Default value of 4. Set in StopDucking method as the normal foot collision height.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.standingWaistHeight
member.summary: Character's waist height when standing in units. Default value of 10. Set in StopDucking method as the normal waist collision height.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.stunTime
member.summary: Duration in seconds remaining for the stun effect. Decremented each frame when greater than zero. During stun, the character cannot perform actions. Combined with dancingTime to trigger dancing animations. Set by various stun methods and can be reduced for heroes in DeathMatch mode.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.stunVocalDelay
member.summary: Delay in seconds before playing stun voice lines. Calculated when stunned with random value between 0.2 and 0.7 seconds based on stun duration. Prevents audio spam from rapid stun effects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.teaBagCheatEnabled
member.summary: Static flag that enables a cheat/easter egg for tea-bagging defeated enemies. Activated by entering a specific code in the main menu. When enabled, allows players to deal "SelfEsteem" damage by ducking near dead units.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.timeBroBoostTime
member.summary: Duration of time-based speed boost effect in seconds, likely from Time Bro's special ability. Counts down each frame and affects delta time calculations independently from high-five boosts.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.toeHeight
member.summary: Current toe/foot height for low collision detection. Default value of 4. Used in raycasts for detecting ground-level obstacles. Dynamically changes based on stance.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.waistHeight
member.summary: Current waist height used for collision detection. Default value of 10. Dynamically changes based on stance (standing/ducking/dead). Used extensively in raycasts and obstacle detection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.xBoxControlled
member.summary: Deprecated field that is never used in the codebase. May have been intended for Xbox controller detection.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AnyInput
member.summary: Checks if any input button is currently pressed (movement, fire, special, jump, or high-five).
member.returns: True if any input is detected, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanUseSwitch
member.summary: Indicates whether this character can activate switches. Default implementation returns true; subclasses can override to add conditions.
member.returns: True if the character can use switches, false otherwise

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckDashing
member.summary: Manages dash state based on player input and sprint status. For local players, detects dash button presses and releases. For remote players, creates visual and audio effects when dash state changes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckInput
member.summary: Main input processing method that handles all player and AI input. Stores previous input states, handles zombie AI input, processes player controller input, manages remote control of vehicles/projectiles, handles idle timeout and kick detection, and integrates special abilities and gestures.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckTriggerActionInput
member.summary: Processes input commands from trigger actions for scripted sequences. Handles movement commands with pathfinding, processes AI commands, tracks command completion, and integrates with PathAgent for navigation.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckWhetherShouldClearInput
member.summary: Virtual method for input clearing logic. Empty in base class, designed for override in derived classes to implement custom input clearing conditions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ClearAllInput
member.summary: Performs a comprehensive reset of all input states. Clears current and previous states for movement, jumping, fire, special, high-five, and taunt buttons.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ClearFireInput
member.summary: Resets all fire-related input states including fire, special abilities, and high-five inputs. Used to clear attack inputs when needed.

Down input state
Jump input state
Climb input state

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetEnemyMovement

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.GetSprintValue
member.summary: Returns the current sprint state of the character.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.IsPressingDown

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PressDashButton

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PressHighFiveMelee(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Handles the high-five/melee button press with complex interaction priority logic. Checks for nearby grenades, mooks, switches, teleport doors, citizens, and other players. Prioritizes interactions based on game mode, proximity, and current state.
