member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PressSpecial
member.summary: Initiates special ability use when the special button is pressed. Only activates if the character is not covered in acid and not performing a melee attack.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PressSpecial2
member.summary: Placeholder method for secondary special ability activation. Currently only resets the animation frame to 0.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReleaseDashButton
member.summary: Stops dashing when the dash button is released, calling StopDashing to handle dash end logic.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReleaseFire
member.summary: Virtual method called when the fire button is released. Empty implementation for subclasses to add weapon-specific release behavior.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReleaseSpecial
member.summary: Virtual method called when the special ability button is released. Empty implementation for subclasses to override.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunForcedInput
member.summary: Processes forced input timers that override player control. Manages hold timers for up, left, right directions and forces specific inputs while timers are active.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopLeftRightInputFromHanging
member.summary: Clears horizontal movement input when hanging. Prevents left/right movement while character is in hanging state.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.InputBits
member.summary: Gets or sets the packed input states for network synchronization. This property packs 11 boolean input flags into a single short value for efficient network transmission.
member.value: A short value containing packed boolean input states for network synchronization.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.airDashJumpGrace
member.summary: Grace period timer allowing jumps shortly after air dashing. Provides a brief window where jump input is accepted even if not technically grounded. Enables fluid air dash to jump combos for advanced movement.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.blockMovementForGesture
member.summary: Prevents movement input during gesture animations. Set to true when starting gestures and blocks movement processing until gesture completes.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.buttonGesture
member.summary: Current frame's gesture button input state from player controls. Used with wasButtonGesture for edge detection to trigger gesture-based actions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.buttonHighFive
member.summary: Current frame's high-five button state. True when high-five/interaction button is pressed. Triggers cooperative high-five actions when near other players. Also used for general player interactions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.buttonJump
member.summary: Current frame's jump button state. True when jump button is pressed, false when released. Primary input for jumping, wall jumping, and various jump-based mechanics. Used with wasButtonJump for edge detection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.buttonTaunt
member.summary: Current frame's taunt button state. True when taunt/gesture button is pressed. Allows players to perform character-specific taunts, gestures, or victory poses. Adds personality to gameplay.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canFireDelay
member.summary: Cooldown timer preventing immediate firing after certain actions. Set to 0.3 seconds after detonating remote car and 0.25 seconds after creating one. Blocks fire and special inputs while positive to prevent accidental double-actions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.climbButton
member.summary: Climbing input state from AI controls. Used by enemy AI to control climbing behavior on ladders and walls.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.dashButton
member.summary: Current frame's dedicated dash button state. Alternative to double-tap dashing, provides direct dash control. When pressed with direction, initiates ground or air dash based on character state.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.down
member.summary: Current frame's down directional input state. True when down is pressed. Used for ducking, dropping through platforms, aiming downward, and sliding mechanics. Essential for defensive and movement options.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.fire
member.summary: Current frame's state of the fire/shoot button input. Controls shooting mechanics, gun animations, and remote projectile control. Prevented during wall climbing, ladder use, or pushing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.holdDownTime
member.summary: Timer for forcing downward input. Field exists but no active usage found in current implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.holdLeftTime
member.summary: Timer for forcing leftward movement. Set to 0.3 seconds in certain conditions and forces left input while active. Decrements each frame when greater than 0.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.holdRightTime
member.summary: Timer for forcing rightward input. Field exists but no active usage found in current implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.holdStillTime
member.summary: Timer that prevents or limits movement when active. Checked in multiple movement conditions and prevents certain actions. Decrements each frame when greater than 0.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.holdUpTime
member.summary: Timer for forcing upward input. Field exists but no active usage found in current implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastButtonJumpTime
member.summary: Timestamp of the most recent jump button press. Used for jump buffering system - if player presses jump slightly before landing, jump executes upon touchdown. Creates more responsive controls.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.left
member.summary: Current frame's left directional input state. True when left is pressed. Primary horizontal movement input for moving left. Combined with other inputs for dashing, wall climbing, and special moves.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.pressedJumpInAirSoJumpIfTouchGroundGrace
member.summary: Grace period timer for jump input buffering while airborne. When jump is pressed in air, this timer counts down. If player lands while timer is positive, automatic jump occurs. Standard platformer quality-of-life feature.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.right
member.summary: Current frame's right directional input state. True when right is pressed. Primary horizontal movement input for moving right. Combined with other inputs for dashing, wall climbing, and special moves.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.special
member.summary: Current frame's state of the special ability button input. Cleared when acid-covered, in melee, dead, or controlled by AI. Used to trigger special abilities.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.specialDown
member.summary: Tracks if special button is currently pressed. Reset during initialization and various game states. Part of input state management system.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.sprint
member.summary: Current frame's sprint modifier state. True when sprint/run button is held. Modifies movement speed when combined with directional inputs. May affect other actions like longer jumps or faster climbing.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.up
member.summary: Current frame's up directional input state. True when up is pressed on D-pad, analog stick, or keyboard. Used for aiming upward, climbing ladders/walls, entering doors, and menu navigation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasButtonGesture
member.summary: Previous frame's gesture button state. Used for edge detection to determine when the gesture button is first pressed.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasButtonHighFive
member.summary: Previous frame's high-five button state. Enables edge detection for high-five activation, ensuring actions trigger on button press rather than hold. Prevents continuous high-five attempts.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasButtonJump
member.summary: Previous frame's jump button state. Used with buttonJump to detect button press (false to true) and release (true to false) events. Essential for preventing jump spam and enabling precise jump control.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasButtonTaunt
member.summary: Previous frame's taunt button state. Used for edge detection to trigger taunts on button press. Prevents continuous taunt animation while button is held, ensuring single taunt per press.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasClimbButton
member.summary: Previous frame's climb button state from AI controls. Used for edge detection of AI climbing inputs.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasDown
member.summary: Previous frame's down directional state. Used for detecting new down presses for actions like initiating duck, platform drops, or slides. Enables proper state transitions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasFire
member.summary: Previous frame's state of the fire button, used for edge detection. Triggers StartFiring() on press and StopFiring() on release, also used in death match invulnerability checks.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasLeft
member.summary: Previous frame's left directional state. Critical for double-tap dash detection - tracks time between taps. Also used for detecting direction changes and state transitions in movement system.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasRight
member.summary: Previous frame's right directional state. Critical for double-tap dash detection - tracks time between taps. Also used for detecting direction changes and state transitions in movement system.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasSpecial
member.summary: Previous frame's state of the special button, used for edge detection. Compared with current special state to detect new button presses vs held inputs.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasSpecialDown
member.summary: Previous frame's special button state. Used for edge detection to identify button press and release events. Companion to specialDown for input tracking.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasSprint
member.summary: Previous frame's sprint modifier state. Enables detection of sprint press/release for smooth speed transitions. Helps manage acceleration and deceleration in movement system.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasUp
member.summary: Previous frame's up directional state. Enables detection of up press/release events. Used for initiating climbs, detecting input combinations, and preventing continuous up-triggered actions.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasXBoxFireDown
member.summary: Previous frame's Xbox controller fire button state. Field declared but no usage found in current implementation. Likely reserved for Xbox-specific input handling.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasdashButton
member.summary: Previous frame's dash button state. Used for edge detection to trigger single dash per button press. Prevents continuous dashing while button is held, ensuring controlled dash execution.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.AssignPushingTime
member.summary: Sets a brief timer when pushing blocks and cancels any rolling animation. Called when the character begins pushing a moveable block.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanCheckClimbAlongCeiling
member.summary: Checks if ceiling climbing mechanics should be evaluated by detecting nearby hanging points. Used to determine if the character can transition to ceiling hanging state.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanDoRollOnLand

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanTouchCeiling
member.summary: Determines whether the character can interact with ceilings.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckClimbAlongCeiling
member.summary: Handles ceiling climbing/hanging mechanics when transitioning from wall constraints. Performs upward raycasts to find ceiling attachment points and initiates hanging state when appropriate conditions are met.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForCheckPoints
member.summary: Checks if character is touching checkpoints at current position or slightly above ground level. Calls ReachedCheckPoint if checkpoint contact is detected.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForQuicksand
member.summary: Manages quicksand detection and transition effects. Tracks quicksand state changes, creates appropriate splash and particle effects on entry/exit, plays surface-specific sounds, and disables blast velocity while in quicksand.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForQuicksandDeath
member.summary: Monitors for lethal quicksand submersion and applies crush damage after 2-second delay. Checks if character is deep in quicksand (16 units below surface) and deals fatal damage if choke counter exceeds threshold.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckForTraps(System.Single)
member.summary: Comprehensive trap detection system. Checks for acid pools, barbed wire, spikes, and mines. Handles impalement, damage, and movement constraints from environmental hazards.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CheckRescues
member.summary: Checks for nearby heroes to rescue and grants rescue bonuses. Provides invulnerability, shows start bubble, and adds brutality grace period.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ConstrainToCeiling(System.Single@)
member.summary: Handles collision detection with ceilings and manages chimney flip mechanics when the character hits walls and ceilings simultaneously.

member.summary: Constrains the character's vertical movement to prevent falling through the floor, handling landing transitions and ground snapping.

member.returns: True if the character was constrained to the floor; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ConstrainToFragileBarriers(System.Single@,System.Single)

The collision detection radius

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ConstrainToMookBarriers(System.Single@,System.Single)

Reference to horizontal velocity, modified if movement is constrained by walls

Vertical offset from character position

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.Land

member.summary: Initializes oil effect materials and applies them to both character and gun sprites. Creates oily materials using "Unlit/Depth Cutout With Image - Oily" shader with lazy instantiation pattern. Sets up UV2 coordinates and configures sprite size vectors for proper oil effect rendering.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.LeaveOil
member.summary: Placeholder method for leaving oil areas. Actual oil cleanup logic is handled by the continuous RunHasLeftOilTest method which manages gradual oil level decay and material restoration.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PickupPickupables

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PushGrassAway
member.summary: Pushes grass away from the unit and plays appropriate environmental sounds. Performs raycasts to find ground blocks, applies forces to jiggle doodads. Plays different sounds for grass versus blood pools based on doodad type.
member.returns: True if any grass was pushed away

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.ReachedCheckPoint
member.summary: Virtual method called when character reaches a checkpoint. Empty implementation that can be overridden by derived classes.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RollOnLand
member.summary: Initiates the rolling animation sequence when landing with sufficient velocity, setting the character to rolling state for 13 frames.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunBlindStars
member.summary: Creates periodic blind star visual effects around blinded characters. Spawns shrapnel stars above character head with randomized positioning.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunClimbingLadder
member.summary: Handles all ladder climbing physics and movement logic, including vertical movement based on input, horizontal positioning, and exit conditions.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunHasLeftOilTest
member.summary: Manages gradual oil level decay and material transitions when leaving oil areas. Decreases oil level over time using deltaTime, updates material opacity properties, and handles cleanup by restoring original materials when oil level reaches zero.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.RunZombieEffects
member.summary: Handles ongoing zombie revival visual effects. Creates periodic zombie passive effects with random timing intervals.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StartHanging
member.summary: Initiates the ceiling hanging state if the character is not ducking.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopHanging

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.StopRolling
member.summary: Ends the rolling state by setting the character to idle or running based on current input.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.WallClimbing
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the character is currently climbing a wall.
member.value: true if the character is wall climbing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:TestVanDammeAnim.WallDrag
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the character is sliding down a wall. Setting this property manages wall drag audio effects, knife climbing state, and parachute deactivation.
member.value: true if the character is sliding down a wall; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.armUpInAnticipationWallClimb
member.summary: Controls arm position during wall climb anticipation. When true, displays the character with arm raised (frame offset +1) in preparation for wall climbing. Provides visual feedback that the character is ready to climb.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.barrierLayer
member.summary: LayerMask defining mobile barriers for collision. Set to "MobileBarriers" layer. Used for specialized mobile obstacle detection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.bossBlockPieceCurrentlyStandingOn
member.summary: Special reference for boss block platforms. Set via GetComponent when landing on boss blocks. Calls StandingOnBlock each frame and LandOn when landing with velocity.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.breakDoorsOpen
member.summary: Determines damage type when hitting doors. When true, sends DamageType.Crush to doors. When false, sends DamageType.Melee. Modifies door destruction behavior on collision.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canChimneyFlip
member.summary: Enables chimney flip ability - jumping between two close walls. When true, character can perform wall jumps in narrow vertical spaces. Provides advanced movement option for certain characters. Currently not actively used in the base implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.canLedgeGrapple
member.summary: Determines if this character can grab and hang from ledges. Default true allows standard ledge grappling behavior. Set to false for characters that should fall instead of grabbing ledges. Checked during collision detection with ledges.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.currentLadderBlock
member.summary: Reference to the ladder block character is currently on. Used to track state transitions between ladders and calls OnBroExit when leaving a ladder.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.fragileLayer
member.summary: LayerMask defining fragile/destructible objects. Set to "DirtyHippie" layer. Combined with ground and platform layers for composite ground detection including destructible terrain.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.groundLayer
member.summary: LayerMask defining which layers are considered solid ground for collision detection. Includes "Ground", "LargeObjects", and "IndestructibleGround" layers. Primary layer for floor, ceiling, and wall collision detection throughout the movement system.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.groundTransform
member.summary: Reference to current ground or platform standing on. Set in AssignGround when landing and used as part of parenting system for moving platforms. Reset to null in ShiftUnitWithParent.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.groundTransformLocalPos
member.summary: Local position on ground or platform. Set in AssignGround with different calculation for Tank vs normal ground. Returned by GetParentedToPos when grounded.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.isInOil
member.summary: Whether character is covered in oil. Set by LandInOil method and applies visual oil shader effect. Automatically clears when oilLevel reaches 0.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.isInQuicksand
member.summary: Whether character is currently in quicksand. Applies 0.4x speed multiplier, 3x slower animation rate, prevents air dashing, and can cause death if submerged for 2+ seconds.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.knifeClimbStabHeight
member.summary: Vertical distance in units between knife stab animations during wall climbing. Default value of 18 units creates a rhythmic stabbing pattern as the character climbs. Works with lastKnifeClimbStabY to trigger stab effects at regular intervals.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ladderClimbingTransitionFrames
member.summary: Counter for ladder mounting/dismounting transition animation. Decrements each frame while playing transition animation. When it reaches 0, normal ladder climbing begins. Provides smooth visual transition onto ladders.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ladderLayer
member.summary: LayerMask defining climbable ladder objects. Set to "Ladders" layer. Core to climbing mechanics with extensive use in ladder detection methods like IsOverLadder and FindNearbyLadder.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.ladderX
member.summary: Stores X position of current ladder for alignment. Set by IsOverLadder methods when ladder is detected. Used to align character to ladder position and passed to AttachToHelicopter for rope ladders.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.lastKnifeClimbStabY
member.summary: Stores the Y position of the last knife stab during wall climbing. Used to determine when to play the next stab animation and sound effect. Stabs occur every knifeClimbStabHeight units of vertical movement to create rhythmic climbing feedback.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.newRaycastHit
member.summary: Secondary raycast storage for complex collision checks. Used exclusively in chimney flip detection logic, allowing nested raycast checks without overwriting the main raycastHit.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.oilLevel
member.summary: Amount of oil coverage on character from 0 to 1. Increases by 0.01 when landing in oil and decreases by 1 per second. Controls oil shader intensity.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.openDoorsLayer
member.summary: LayerMask defining interactive doors and movable objects. Set to "Movetivate" layer. Used for door collision checks at high speed and triggers damage/opening mechanics. Excludes parachute objects.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.platformLayer
member.summary: LayerMask defining layers that act as platforms (can stand on but pass through from below). Set to "Platform" layer. Often combined with groundLayer for comprehensive ground detection.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.prevLadderBlock
member.summary: Tracks previous ladder block for state management. Stores previous ladder before updating current and ensures OnBroExit is called on the previous ladder when switching. Prevents duplicate exit calls.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.quicksandChokeCounter
member.summary: Timer until quicksand kills the character. Initialized to 2 seconds. Reset to 0 when entering quicksand and increments while head is submerged. Character dies when counter reaches 2.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.raycastHit
member.summary: Primary storage for Physics.Raycast results. Reused throughout for ground detection, wall checks, ceiling checks, and damage application. Stores hit point, normal, distance, and collider information.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.raycastHitWalls
member.summary: Stores raycast results for wall collision detection. Extensively used in ConstrainToWalls for collision detection at multiple heights, ledge grabbing, footstep sounds, and wall transform assignment.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.switchesLayer
member.summary: LayerMask likely intended for interactive switches and triggers. Not initialized or used in TestVanDammeAnim base implementation.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.victoryLayer
member.summary: LayerMask defining level completion/victory trigger areas. Set to "Finish" layer. Used in IsOverFinish method to detect when player reaches level completion zones.

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wallClimbAnticipation

member.name: F:TestVanDammeAnim.wasInQuicksand
member.summary: Tracks previous frame's quicksand state for edge detection. Compared with isInQuicksand to detect when character enters or exits quicksand.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.CanLaugh

member.summary: Plays tertiary attack sound effect for advanced combat actions.

member.summary: Plays quaternary attack sound effect with custom volume and pitch settings.

Base pitch modifier (default 0.9)

Base pitch value with 0.05 random variation applied (default 1.0)

Volume level for the footstep sound
Pitch level for the footstep sound

member.summary: Plays gibbing sounds with variation based on frozen state. Plays frozen gib sounds if the character is frozen, otherwise plays normal death sounds.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayGreetingSound
member.summary: Plays greeting sound effect for character interactions and high-five initiations.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayHighFiveSound

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayHitSound(System.Single)
member.summary: Plays hit reaction sounds with conditional logic based on health state. If alive and hurt sounds are available, plays hurt sound with a 0.1 second cooldown. Otherwise plays effort sounds. Scales volume to 0.37 for hurt sounds.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayJumpSound

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayKnifeClimbSound
member.summary: Plays knife climbing sound effects with automatic variation cycling. Increments sound counter and uses modulo operation to cycle through available knife wall sounds. Plays at 0.2f volume and 1f pitch with 3D positioning.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayLandSound
member.summary: Plays appropriate landing sound based on current ground surface type. Supports six surface types (Dirt, Stone, Metal, Wood, Grass, Slime) with corresponding sound arrays. All landing sounds play at 0.6f volume and 1f pitch.

member.name: M:TestVanDammeAnim.PlayLaughterSound
